summary: The diff shows only modifications to MissionsButton.tsx positioning (changing its left position to 9.5rem), which partially addresses REQ-1. However, the diff does not show corresponding changes to FoldersButton.tsx to verify both buttons are positioned adjacent to each other with appropriate spacing, nor does it show any parent container changes that would coordinate their layout.

missing_requirements.requirement: Verify that FoldersButton component is positioned to work with the new MissionsButton positioning to ensure they are horizontally adjacent
missing_requirements.reason: Only MissionsButton.tsx changes are visible in the diff. No changes to FoldersButton.tsx or parent layout components are shown to confirm the buttons are properly positioned relative to each other

missing_requirements.requirement: Document or verify the spacing calculation between the two icons
missing_requirements.reason: The MissionsButton is positioned at left-[9.5rem], but without seeing FoldersButton's position or a parent container managing both, the spacing between them cannot be verified as providing clear visual distinction per acceptance criteria
